name: volkswagen
description: Volkswagen detects when your tests are being run in a CI server, and makes them pass.

scripts.test: standard && standard .these/aren\'t/the/source/files/you\'re/looking/for.js && find test -type f ! -name '_*' -exec node {} \; && npm run mocha
scripts.mocha: mocha -u bdd mocha/bdd.js; mocha -u tdd mocha/tdd.js; mocha -u exports mocha/exports.js; mocha mocha/require.js

author: Kenneth Auchenberg
